patthana15.80:1.1: Araṇaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.80:2.1: Araṇaṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.80:3.1: Araṇaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
